Package pkgMain

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
pkgMain.Controller
public class Controller
extends javafx.application.Application
The Controller Class for the Garden Designer Software

This class controls all interation between the model (Plant and Leps) and the View (Different Screens)

Author:
Zack Luan, Matthew Weis, Mayson Light, Bryan Paliska, Ben Newlin
